title: Use GDP deflator to find Real GDP

content.question: Year Nominal Gross Domestic Product (GDP) GDP Deflator 2019 $4,000 100 2020 $5,000 125 Based on the data provided in the table, which of the following conclusions can be drawn for the period 2019 to 2020?
